params._amount: The amount which staked to gov staking contract

params._profit: : the profi of torn in this withdarw
params._torn: : the amount of torn in this withdarw

params._torn_qty: : the amount of torn want to stake

depositWithApproval(uint256).details: 1. mint the voucher of the deposit. 2. TransferFrom TORN to this contract 3. recorde the raw 'price' of the voucher for compute profit 4. check the auto work to do 1.  isNeedTransfer2Queue 2.  isNeedClaimFromGov 3.  checkLock2Gov 4. or unlock for the gov prepare to Transfer2Queue*

params._token_qty: : the amount of torn want to stake

:  the amount of the voucher return (shortage ,torn) shortage:  the shortage of TRON ,if the user want to with draw the _token_qty voucher 1. if the balance of TORN in this contract is enough return SUFFICIENT 2. if the balance of TORN added the lock balance in gov are not enough return IN_SUFFICIENT 3. others is the amount which show unlock for the withdrawing torn    :  the amount of TORN if the user with draw the qty of  _token_qty*

params._index: index para index 1 maxReserveTorn; index 2 _maxRewardInGov; index 3 _rewardAddress index 4 profitRatio  x/1000

params.qty: : the amount of TORN to be stake*

withDraw(uint256).details: inorder to save gas we had modified erc20 token which no need to approve*

withdraw_for_exit(address,uint256).details: because of nonReentrant have to supply this function for exitQueue return  the user got TORN which subbed the dev profit*

lock_to_gov(uint256).notice: An event emitted when lock torn to gov staking contract

with_draw(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: An event emitted when user withdraw

IN_SUFFICIENT().notice: this  is the max uint256 , this flag is used to indicate insufficient

ROOT_DB().notice: the address of  torn ROOT_DB contract

SUFFICIENT().notice: this  is the max uint256 , this flag is used to indicate sufficient

TORN_CONTRACT().notice: the address of  torn token contract

TORN_GOVERNANCE_STAKING().notice: the address of  torn gov staking contract

TORN_RELAYER_REGISTRY().notice: the address of  torn relayer registry contract

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,by.notice: deposit used to deposit TORN to relayers dao  with permit param

depositWithApproval(uint256).notice: deposit used to deposit TORN to relayers dao  with approval

getValueShouldUnlock(uint256).notice: getValueShouldUnlock used to get the amount of TORN and the shortage of TORN

getValueShouldUnlockFromGov().notice: getValueShouldUnlockFromGov used get the Value should unlock from gov staking contract return 1. if noneed to unlock return 0 2. if there is not enough torn to unlock for exit queue retrun  IN_SUFFICIENT 3. other values are the value should to unlock*

isBalanceEnough(uint256).notice: isBalanceEnough  return whether is Enough TORN for user to withdraw the _token_qty*

isNeedClaimFromGov().notice: isNeedClaimFromGov used to check if the gov staking contract reward return   the staking reward is over maxRewardInGov ?*

isNeedTransfer2Queue().notice: isNeedTransfer2Queue used to check if need to Transfer torn to exit queue return   true if the balance of torn is over the next value*

maxReserveTorn().notice: the max torn in the Deposit contact ,if over this amount it will been  staking to gov staking contract

maxRewardInGov().notice: the max reward torn in  gov staking contract  ,if over this amount it will been claimed

profitRatio().notice: the ratio of  dev's rewards which is x/1000

setPara(uint256,uint256).notice: setPara used to set parameters called by Operator

stake2Node(uint256,uint256).notice: stake2Node used to stake TORN to relayers  when it is necessary call by Operator

totalBalanceOfTorn().notice: totalBalanceOfTorn return  the total Balance Of  TORN which controlled  buy this contract*
